script_line: A muscular caveman in his 20s with long brown hair and beard walks through a rugged prehistoric landscape, returning to his cave after a hunt, carrying a spear and animal hide.
The caveman enters the dark, rocky interior of his cave, looking tired but relieved, with faint sunlight streaming through the entrance.
The caveman kneels by a small pile of sticks and stones, striking flints to create sparks and start a fire inside the cave.
A warm fire glows in the cave, casting light on the cavemanâ€™s face as he sits cross-legged, watching the flames with satisfaction.
The caveman cooks a piece of raw meat over the fire, holding it on a sharpened stick, with smoke rising and the cave walls illuminated by flickering light.
